column5: i just wanted to thank rockys tackle repair in orillia for the excellent service they provide! they are a quantum warranty center and i have never had an issue dealing with them! ive sent rods and reels and they are so fast at getting them back to me. they fixed a reel for me last year, and i broke the same part on the reel one week after it was fixed lol, i called them and sent the reel in last thursday, and got the reel back tuesday good as new! also sent in 2 rods to warranty, one of which i lost all of the rod but the handle due to an odd break, and they warrantied that rod for me as well, i should have those rods by next week.  if u ever need a quantum rod or reel fixed, give these guys a call, they are great!
I've got a couple of reels that could use some TLC beyond what I am capable to giving them. Can they tune other brands? What about non-Quantum rod repairs?

They also do warranty on Shakespeare,johnson,mitchell,zebco,abu garcia,okuma,diawa,rapala and quantum reels they might do more but the business card I have is 4-5 years old.More than likely they can TLC anything,I had him look at my dad's pflueger reel from the 40s but he couldn't get a handle for it.   vance
Where is he located exactly. I have a few Abu's that need some lovin'.
agreed. They fixed up my minn kota trolling motor a few years back. Thing would only run at top speed...nearly fired me into the lake the first time I turned it on and it had this problem
Rockey's Tackle Services 10 Brammer Dr Orillia Ont l3v 7t4 705-325-3526 705-325-3481  vance
I know that could have been serious, but the image of that made me laugh.
Last I heard Rocky wasnt doing MinnKota anymore, I could be wrong.  Excellent guy to work with though, I've dealt with him many times and have nothing bad to say
